successes.title: Rumpl - The World's Best Blanket
successes.description: The modern blanket inspired by active lifestyles and made from materials developed for the outdoor industry.

Pledges.description: Thanks guys! The support is appreciated. We'll send you Rumpl stickers and put you on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco. You'll also be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.
You'll get a limited edition Rumpl t-shirt. Available in XS-XXL. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.

!! SPECIAL EARLYBIRD REWARD !!
You get a THROW-sized blanket from our first production run. 25% off retail price of $89.99. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.

You get a THROW-sized blanket from our first production run. 10% off retail price of $89.99. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.

You get a TWIN-sized blanket from our first production run. 20% off retail price of $109.99. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.

!! SPECIAL EARLYBIRD REWARD !! You get a QUEEN-sized blanket from our first production run. 25% off retail price of $149.99. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.

You get a QUEEN-sized blanket from our first production run. 10% off retail price of $149.99. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.

You get a KING-sized blanket from our first production run. 20% off retail price of $179.99. You'll also be put on our guest list for our private launch party in San Francisco and be kept up-to-date on the latest at Rumpl.
The Whole Enchilada - The T shirt, The throw blanket, The bed blanket (specify size), more stickers than you can stick, the party, AND your name on a special thank you card to all supporters.
You be the designer! Help us design and name a limited edition pattern and receive a blanket that you helped create.
